location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 92 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'a'; '39'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View at Mohammerah [Khorramshahr] on the banks of the Karun river. The shoreline extends from lower right to centre left. Several small canoes are pulled up along the shore, while larger boats lie at anchor left of centre, with another dhow under sail on the right. Along the distant horizon the opposite bank of the river can be seen.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘'Mohammerah’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘a’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘39’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘Karun River.’, (May. 1917)’
